ggsample 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    ggsample

    The goal of ggsample provide easy-to-use functions for sampling. Package is educational.

    Installation

    And the development version from GitHub with:

    # install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("EvaMaeRey/ggsample")

    Example

    library(ggsample)
my_seed <- sample(1:100, 1)
library(ggplot2)
#> Warning: package 'ggplot2' was built under R version 3.6.2
ggplot(data = cars) +
  aes(x = speed, y = dist) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = lm,
             se = FALSE) +
   geom_point_sample(color = "red",
                     seed = my_seed) +
   geom_lm_sample(color = "red",
                  seed = my_seed)
#> Default sample_size is 10
#> sample size is 10 by default
#> `geom_smooth()` using formula 'y ~ x'
